name: Catlike Magic
description:
One day when you wake up you feel a sharp pain through your chest, suddenly your senses start to betray you, your inwards feel as if they were on fire, girls start to look cuter the more you look at them, you have been cursed. Dwelve into the dark depths of the rainforest, and find the dark crypt from where the curse came from.

Catlike Magic is a top-down auto-shooter bullet hell game where you play as a tiny cat mage trying to get rid of a curse.

Features:
  • Various magic skills to hurt your enemies with.
  • Special modifiers that significantly improve or change the functioning of those skills.
  • Goblins that send you flying across the screen.
  • 30+ unique items that increase your stats or give you special effects.
  • 6 different characters to play as, from tiny cats to bigger cats to goblins."
